Texts.Eng: A carton of ice cream, just for me. Heh heh.

Texts.Chs: 啊，完美的分手款待。。。并不是说我对那件事一无所知。
Texts.Eng: Ah, the perfect breakup treat... Not that I'd know anything about that.

Texts.Chs: 叶族人曾经有过一个朋友，他们一勺一勺地吃冰淇淋。他们现在死了。
Texts.Eng: Floran once had friends who ssnuck scoops of their ice cream. They're dead now.

Texts.Chs: 我承认，我买了家庭装大小的冰激凌盒。。。就为了我自己。
Texts.Eng: I'll admit, I've bought family-sized cartons of ice cream... for just myself.

Texts.Chs: 我以前被抓过几次然后直接从纸箱里吃东西。
Texts.Eng: I've been caught a few times eating straight out of the carton before.
Perhaps I'll have just... one... scoop...

Texts.Chs: 什么味道？就是最好的味道！
Texts.Eng: What flavor? Just the best flavor!

Texts.Chs: 谁把这个纸箱拿了出来，却没有把它放回去？太不懂事了。
Texts.Eng: Who took this carton out and didn't bother to put it back up? So inconsiderate.
